gen:link.msg:message: `QuantifiableRights` MOET gelijk zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_QuantifiableRights')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_QuantifiableRights return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfQuantifiableRightsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfQuantifiableRightsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfQuantifiableRightsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfQuantifiableRightsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`QuantifiableRights` MOET ook gerapporteerd worden, omdat minimaal één van de onderliggende waarden van `QuantifiableRights` wordt gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfQuantifiableRights')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfQuantifiableRights return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_QuantifiableRights')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_OffBalanceSheetRightsConsolidatedHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_QuantifiableRights return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
